summary: Use this API to upload a waybill pdf to Lazada site
description: Use this API to upload a waybill pdf to Lazada site. The maximum size of an pdf file is 1MB.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/fbl/waybill/upload')
request.add_file_parameter("waybill","./IopSdk.rb")
request.add_api_parameter("package_code", "HU2005191006185")
request.add_api_parameter("tracking_number", "LEXPU0017101924")
request.add_api_parameter("extends_field", "none")
request.add_api_parameter("store_code", "STORE_188564")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/fbl/waybill/upload')
request.add_file_param('waybill',open('/Users/IopSdk.py').read())
request.add_api_param('package_code', 'HU2005191006185')
request.add_api_param('tracking_number', 'LEXPU0017101924')
request.add_api_param('extends_field', 'none')
request.add_api_param('store_code', 'STORE_188564')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
